author: Lotte Duncan
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Mix all the ingredients together. Either roll into balls or spread out evenly in a greased ovenproof dish. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown all over and cooked through.
ingredients: 1 large onion, chopped,  2 cloves garlic, crushed,  450g/1lb sausage meat,  1 tbsp chopped parsley,  2 tbsp chopped sage,  25g/1oz  fresh white breadcrumbs,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
